articles.author: Audrey McAvoy, Hallie Golden
articles.title: Late-night shows address Jimmy Kimmel suspension with humor and solidarity - AP News
articles.description: Jon Stewart, Stephen Colbert and Jimmy Fallon have opened their late-night shows using a mix of humor and solidarity with suspended ABC host Jimmy Kimmel. Stewart opted for satire to critique ABC suspending “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” indefinitely following comments…
articles.content:
Jon Stewart, Stephen Colbert and Jimmy Fallon opened their late-night shows Thursday using a mix of humor and solidarity with suspended ABC host Jimmy Kimmel.

articles.title: Cardi B Is Back and Out For Blood on ‘Am I the Drama?’ - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Cardi B's 'Am i the Drama?' reviewed: The superstar is back and out for blood
articles.content: She’s baaaaack. Cardi B has finally returned with Am I the Drama?, one of the most hotly awaited second albums in history. Incredibly, it’s been seven years since the Bronx queen crashed into the mus… [+6310 chars]

articles.author: Martha Ross
articles.title: Robert Redford’s neighbors reveal his quiet, ‘sad’ life in Bay Area town - The Mercury News
articles.description: Redford’s Tiburon neighbors remember him as a gracious man who missed his son, who lived nearby and died in 2020.
articles.content: For four years, Robert Redford and his wife, Sibylle Szaggars, lived in a hillside “cottage” in Tiburon, with spectacular views of Angel Island and San Francisco Bay. They enjoyed Tiburon’s restauran… [+4985 chars]
